means: 签名承认（担保），签名接受（保险）

sentence.Network_en: National banks can package their own mortgages and underwrite them as securities.
sentence.Network_cn: 国家银行能够合并自己的抵押贷款并以证券形式包销。

sentence.Network_en: No bank would be willing to underwrite such a loss.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有哪家银行愿意承担这样的损失.

sentence.Network_en: A group of ten international banks is to underwrite and sell the bonds.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个由10家国际银行组成的银团将包销及出售这些债券.

entry.tran: (机构或公司)为…保险，负担…的费用，承销
entry.def: If an institution or company underwrites an activity or underwrites the cost of it, they agree to provide any money that is needed to cover losses or buy special equipment, often for an agreed fee.

example.ex: ...58,500 dollars to underwrite a new home...
The government will have to create a special agency to underwrite small business loans...
example.tran: 政府需要设立专门机构来为小企业贷款作担保。

sentences.sentence: "The opera tour was subvented by a bank"

auth_sentence.content: Given a handsome sum...which would underwrite the publishing venture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Given a handsome sum...which would underwrite the publishing venture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Given a handsome sum...which would underwrite the publishing venture.

auth_sentence.content: In this way, he helped underwrite Massoud's movement.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this way, he helped underwrite Massoud's movement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this way, he helped underwrite Massoud's movement.

auth_sentence.content: The Government will underwrite the project risks.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Government will underwrite the project risks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Government will underwrite the project risks.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……下"; 2. "副手"; 3. 表示"不足,不够"

stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+handed手的→在底下做手脚
under不足,不够+develop发展+ed……的→发展不够
under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under不足,不够+populate移民于+ed表形容词→adj.人口稀少的
under不足,不够+sized大小的→不够大的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生
stems_affixes.word_buile: under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面
under在……下+line线→在字底下划线,引申为强调

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承担, 担任, 许诺, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+take拿→在下面拿→承担, 担任

stems_affixes.value_cn: 签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+write写→v.签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
under不足,不够+play玩→没玩够→说得不够的

means.word_mean: 在(保险单,尤指船舶保险单)下方签署并承担责任(承保损失或损坏之责);给...保险

sentences.en: No bank would be willing to underwrite such a loss.
sentences.cn: 没有哪家银行愿意承担这样的损失。

means.word_mean: (按商定的价格)认购(某公司)的全部剩余证券;包销(证券)

sentences.cn: 一个由10家国际银行组成的银团将包销及出售这些债券。
